ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About me
ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION_ONE: I'm a Full Stack Developer with more than 5 years of experience in the IT sector. I have worked in different projects and technologies, from web development to mobile development, always looking for the best solution to the problem.
ABOUT_ME.PHRASE: Focus on creating maintainable and clean code.
ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION_TWO: I like working with agile methodologies, like Scrum, and with tools like Jira, Git, Bitbucket, etc. I also like to work with good development practices, such as TDD, SOLID, DRY, KISS, etc. and with continuous integration tools such as Jenkins, SonarQube, etc.

EDUCATION.TITLE: Advanced education in Multiplatform Application Development
EDUCATION.DESCRIPTION: During two years of education at IES Virgen de la Paz I learned the fundamentals of object-oriented programming, relational databases and other basic programming concepts. Learning mainly Java.

ANGULAR_BOOTCAMP.TITLE: Angular Bootcamp at Hello World! Software School
ANGULAR_BOOTCAMP.DESCRIPTION: For three months I learned the basics of web programming, learning Angular. I also developed general concepts of programming and computer science focused on the working world by working and practicing concepts.

DEVDEL.TITLE: Junior Full Stack at Dev&Del
DEVDEL.DESCRIPTION: Working in a software consultancy for projects in the insurance sector in Spain. Working mainly with Angular, Java with Spring, Git and more technologies.
